_sText:
Hello guys
==========

V2 Changes
------------------

Balanced verseion after 1 Testrun on a server:

- The 1. Attack that Bieber does deals no dmg anymore because it is very unbalanced when people dont have already bought a weapon
- Better Initiate sequence: People have time in arena to buy weapons. 
- Removed those buildings. Reason: unneedet physics only slow down weak pcs
- New location of teleport to lobby that forces people to explore the dungeon

This is my new bossfight map
It has everything a boss needs

AIM is to kill **JUSTIN BIEBER**

- HP bar where you see how much hp he has left
- Attacks get announced so you know what attack he do
- HP scales with amount of players fighting

New dmg formula system
There are hitzones like in monster hunter
- low dmg for legs
- med dmg for body
- high dmg for head
- You can see which hitbox you are hitting
- they have different surfaceprops

Theres also a little dungeon where you can unlock special weapons. They have spells you can activate by pressing E while holdng such weapon
This boss also has a enraged system
Its an own counter that for rage and if this is full he enrages like you know it from monster hunter. Then he has different attacks
- If you beat normal then you unlock hardcore

- Map supports 32 players
But i dont recommend more than 16 players or its just to crowdet

This should be an example map of a bossfight.
I upload a prefab for the dmg system later and write a tutorial how to make some basic attacks

The hitboxes are also easy to hook by servers when an experience system is running on a server

The names are

- hitbox_low
- hitbox_med
- hitbox_crit
